H0.text: The phases of the Moon are best visualized using a model of the Sun, Earth, and Moon.

H1.text: The effects of gravitation are best visualized by a model of the Sun, Earth, and Moon.

H2.text: The effects of volcanic eruptions are best visualized by a model of the Sun, Earth, and Moon.

H3.text: The consequences of earthquakes is what a model of the Sun, Earth, and Moon best helps students visualize.

A4.text: The phases are not caused by the Earth's shadow falling on the Moon, as some people believe. They are caused by the Moon's shadow on itself, just as the Earth's shadow makes it night on one side of the Earth.
